summary: Completed comprehensive testing of AI Agent Builder platform MVP. All core features are working correctly including dashboard, agent CRUD operations, flow builder, testing playground, tools library, knowledge base, analytics, and LLM integration.
passed_tests: Dashboard page loads with all stats cards
Create Agent modal with Chat/Voice/Multi-modal tabs
Agent list page with search and filtering
Flow builder with React Flow canvas and node palette
Agent test page with chat functionality
Navigation between all pages (Tools, Knowledge, Analytics, Settings)
React Flow controls, minimap, and save functionality
